Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: Got really tired of all the Pizza, Hamburger, Chinese, Italian, Argentinian, etc.  restaurants in Amsterdam. Its the Netherlands, a Germanic country so why can't you find good local food? Look no further...great locally owned and operated ‚Ä¶

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: Wonderful service, beautiful sights all around. The waitress we got adjusted excellently when switching between my irish friend and dutch me. I'll admit i was tempted to give a 100% tip, but reasons

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: Location is good, near the central station of Amsterdam. The food is average but the staff on duty today are very helpful. The decoration inside is a bit old. Need to refurbish.

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: The warmer and cozyest place to eat in Amsterdam, I had the best steak I have ever eaten and the waitress was extremely kind. Absolutely recommended! üòç

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: We were there for lunch on a damp and chilly day and the pea soup was a godsend.  The place is warm and welcoming.  The staff was very pleasant and offered suggestions and explanations as to how dishes were prepared.   Everything we had was ‚Ä¶

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: We found this restaurant by chance on Saturday evening and thoroughly enjoyed our dinner here . We were made to feel comfortable and welcome from the start. We thoroughly enjoyed the bread basket to start with as well as the dishes that ‚Ä¶

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: It was... Fine. The soup and steak were a bit under spiced. The quality of the food was very average and the preparation mediocre. My medium steak was rather rare and not that high quality. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: Got there just about 1230 and were served quickly. It was quiet but soon filled up as we were early for lunch. Olde world decor, snug and cosy for couples. Had a steak and chips for 15 euros. Nice and juicy. Great chips and peppercorn ‚Ä¶

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: The location of this restaurant is brilliant, just few steps from Amsterdam Central train station. We sat outside and enjoyed the views. Some of the dishes in their menus weren't available, I ordered half chicken and my wife got fried camembert cheese. The food was good but nothing special, the prices were average.

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: The food was alright and reasonably priced. Wish I could say the same about the service. I went to this place because its so close to the central station and I had limited time before I had to catch a train. The waitress seemed very ‚Ä¶

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: Last week my family was visiting and we ate on the bar side of the restaurant.  My father paid the bill for the amount owed, and our waiter gave him a huge lecture about how he didn‚Äôt leave a tip, and that whoever told him tipping isn‚Äôt ‚Ä¶

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: Service was slow and unfocused, food was average in best case. On the bill they charged the biggest meal, even if you had a small one. Seems like kitchen is not ready in afternoon hours, waiting time was nearly 1h.

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: Cool bar to sit and enjoy yourself and all Amsterdam has to offer. Extremely friendly staff. Be careful stairs are tricky. As you can see in photos.

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: Food was ok. Except for the tomato soup! That was yummy. Service was a little lacking as we felt as if we were being ignored. People who ordered after us would get their food first.

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: Good pub food with large portions.  The staff was busy but still able to be a little friendly.  Tour groups were also seated to early dinners.

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text:
Nice, old and not that busy place - except its toilet - with fast service.The music CD is allways the same what the staff like much and singing together for.
It would be better with more main courses and less people who go to the toilet all the time from the street.

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: Ordered the Dutch steak special with salad and fries. Lovely tender and tasty steak.

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: Nice bar for a drink or somehting to eat. It's nice to sit outside in the summer. Little pricey but that is Amsterdam.

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: Friendly staff, brilliant offers and Beautiful food! Highly recommend to anyone visiting.

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: Good seating outside but the menu choices aren't top for my taste

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: Nice interior, good prices, tasty food, helpful staff. What can I say?! I liked it!

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: Ambience and service is good. But steak is terrible. Very dry. Not recommended, at least for steak.

Name: De Kroonprins
Review Text: Very good staff, better food and experience than expected. Very good atmosphere.

Name: De Kroonprins
